title: God Will Take Care Of You
author: Civilla Durfee Martin (1866-1948)
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c v5 c

v1: God will take care of you!
Beneath His wings of love abide,
God will take care of you!
v2: Through days of toil when heart does fail,
God will take care of you!
When dangers fierce your path assail,
God will take care of you!
v3: All you may need He will provide,
God will take care of you!
Trust Him, and you will be satisfied,
God will take care of you!
v4: Lonely and sad, from friends apart,
God will take care of you!
He will give peace to your aching heart,
God will take care of you!
v5: No matter what may be the test,
God will take care of you!
Lean, weary one, upon His breast,
God will take care of you!
c1: God will take care of you,
Through every day o'er all the way;
He will take care of you;
God will take care of you!
